title: Mysteries in History
description: Host Peter Graves narrates reenactments of mysterious and unexplained events from history.
quote: Here is one of their stories that ‘never happened’ from one of their files that doesn’t exist.
altHero: host Peter Graves sitting in a study
alt1: against a cornfield, a group of “aliens” in sliver clothing approach a group of men dressed in black suits and sunglasses
alt2: a golden ice cream cone-looking spaceship lands in the cornfield
alt3: a beautiful blonde woman “alien” in front of a silver space ship
alt4: the men in black look up holding futuristic guns
